data_requester.build: bash -c "venv/bin/pip install -r canisters/data_requester/requirements.txt --target .dfx/local/py_packages && venv/bin/python3 -m uagents.cli build canisters/data_requester/src/main.py"

data_provider.build: bash -c "venv/bin/pip install -r canisters/data_provider/requirements.txt --target .dfx/local/py_packages && venv/bin/python3 -m uagents.cli build canisters/data_provider/src/main.py"

reputation_agent.build: bash -c "venv/bin/pip install -r canisters/reputation_agent/requirements.txt --target .dfx/local/py_packages && venv/bin/python3 -m uagents.cli build canisters/reputation_agent/src/main.py"
